title: Cheese and onion rarebit
ingredients: ['90 ml (3 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '½ tsp mustard powder', '125 g (4½ oz) well-flavoured mature Cheddar cheese, grated', '40 g (1¼ oz) fresh wholemeal breadcrumbs', '4 thick slices wholemeal bread, about 45 g (1½ oz) each', '1 small red onion, very thinly sliced', 'Baby spinach, apple and celery salad', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 tbsp walnut or hazelnut oil', '2 tsp red wine vinegar', '2 tsp poppy seeds', '200 g (7 oz) baby spinach leaves', '2 red-skinned dessert apples, quartered, cored and sliced', '2 celery sticks, sliced', 'salt and pepper']
